definition: to go and sit an examination
to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam

sentences.english: Students are allowed to bring class notes, homework solutions, and readings to the exam.
sentences.chinese: 学生可带课堂笔记，作业解答以及阅读书目赴考。

court examination, the top grade imperial exam
